agency.body:
Blog
TAC
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

ARC data shows how corporate and leisure travel are recovering along with the top destinations for consumer travel in spring.

Airline Refund and Exchange Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds, have reinstated refunds in the GDS; and those that have extended ARC’s Processing Validity beyond the standard 13 months.

Learn More

3rdparty.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

ARC Travel Demand offers timely intelligence to help you track and manage air travel's recovery.

Learn More

LEO.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom
On-Demand Webinars

This year, ARC’s annual TravelConnect conference went virtual, with a monthly series of videos and virtual events featuring experts across the air travel industry.

Each event featured deep insights on topics ranging from travel technology to COVID-19 regulations, airline sales data and fraud prevention. In chronological order, here are 10 of the best moments from the series in 2020.

Read More

airport.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

'As the air travel community deals with the turbulent landscape caused by COVID-19, ARC is committed to providing timely information to help our partners and all those involved in the industry make responsible, informed decisions.

View the effect COVID-19 has had on airline ticketing by comparing this year’s numbers to 2019. ARC is currently collecting data on YOY changes in tickets issued and variance in tickets sold by segment by US travel agencies and processed through the ARC settlement system, plus the average air ticket price for US domestic round trips.'

Learn More

login.body:
What is NDC & how does it work? At today’s @ASTAAgents Corporate Advisory Committee Meeting, ARC’s VP of Product, Doug Mangold, answers these questions & gives a comprehensive view of #NDC in the air travel industry. Learn more about ARC supporting NDC

Learn More

Despite devastating hurricanes in late 2017, air ticket purchases to areas less impacted remain very strong in 2018. Overall, average ticket prices decreased 4% #ARCdata #SpringBreak

Learn More

The theme for this year’s TravelConnect is “Transforming Together” and will feature Dan Clay, Wayne Best and Holly Hegeman. #TravelConnect2018

Learn More

ARC Newsroom

In episode 7 of the TravelConnect Virtual Series, Southwest Airlines' Rob Brown joins United Airlines' Tye Radcliffe and ARC's Peter Kane to discuss their omnichannel retailing journeys, and what's on the horizon for both airlines and their customers.
